paragraphs.content: Then said Jesus unto his disciples, If any man will come after me, let him deny himself, and take up his cross and follow me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Then said Jesus unto his disciples, If any man will come after me, let him deny himself, and take up his cross and follow me.

paragraphs.content: And now for a man to take up his cross, is to deny himself all ungodliness, and every worldly lust, and keep my commandments.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And now for a man to take up his cross, is to deny himself all ungodliness, and every worldly lust, and keep my commandments.

paragraphs.content: Break not my commandments for to save your lives; for whosoever will save his life in this world, shall lose it in the world to come.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Break not my commandments for to save your lives; for whosoever will save his life in this world, shall lose it in the world to come.

paragraphs.content: And whosoever will lose his life in this world, for my sake, shall find it in the world to come.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And whosoever will lose his life in this world, for my sake, shall find it in the world to come.

paragraphs.content: Therefore, forsake the world, and save your souls; for what is a man profited, if he shall gain the whole world, and lose his own soul? Or what shall a man give in exchange for his soul?
paragraphs.contentHtml: Therefore, forsake the world, and save your souls; for what is a man profited, if he shall gain the whole world, and lose his own soul? Or what shall a man give in exchange for his soul?
